Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<cardPile>

    public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<cardPile>
    Game model that creates the game and has the reset method, creates the cardPiles, method that moves the cards

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameModel()
      Creates the empty cardPiles and resets them
